item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Does the walker choose the path, or the path the walker?" -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Touchstone watched, suddenly conscious that he probably only had five seconds left to be alone with Sabriel, to say something, to say anything. Perhaps the last five seconds they ever would have alone together. I am not afraid, he said to himself. "I love you," he whispered. "I hope you don't mind." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Often, I get the feeling that the story is really happening somewhere and all I'm doing is trying to work out the best way to tell it." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Do not tarry, do not stop, no matter what happens." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Sometimes it is easier to see the light when you stand partly in the darkness." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Drew Barrymore
item.description: "If you don't take risks, you'll have a wasted soul." -- Drew Barrymore

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Drew Barrymore
item.description: "In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths." -- Drew Barrymore

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Drew Barrymore
item.description: "I never regret anything. Because every little detail of your life is what made you into who you are in the end." -- Drew Barrymore

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Drew Barrymore
item.description: "A fish may love a bird, but where would they live? - Then I shall build you wings." -- Drew Barrymore

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sahar add a quote by William Shakespeare
Sahar add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "Life is short for those who are truly able to understand that one day the entire world will come to a complete end. Not everyone is capable of that. Not everyone has the ability to comprehend what going away for all eternity really implies. There are too many distractions, hour by hour, minute by minute, to hinder such an understanding." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Be careful..you're all I've got left, to remind me who I really am." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "I love you," he whispered. "I hope you don't mind." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "But we survived, didn’t we? That makes it an adventure. If you get killed it’s a tragedy." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "A hundred hundred heartbeats..." whispered Sabriel, tears falling down her face." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "It's not the walker that chooses the path, but the path the walker." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Alternatives! Probabilities!" -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Fear and realisation of ignorance, strong medicines against stupid pride." -- Garth Nix

item.title: Sahar add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis
